MF.defaultFolderDialogDescriptionL1: Any new macro(s) will be included in this folder
MF.defaultFolderDialogDescriptionL2: Macros in this folder will show up as Unassigned
MF.folderDialogDescriptionL1: Any marked macro(s) will be included in this folder.
MF.folderDialogDescriptionL2: A macro can only belong to one folder.
